description: Git branch creation exercise for Day 2 workspace simulation

introduction.title: Create a Feature Branch
introduction.description: Before making any changes, create a branch to isolate your work.

whyBranch.title: Protects main branch
whyBranch.description: Your changes won't affect others until reviewed

whyBranch.title: Enables collaboration
whyBranch.description: Others can review your code before merging

whyBranch.title: Creates clear history
whyBranch.description: Each feature has its own isolated history

completionMessage.title: Branch Created
completionMessage.description: You're now working on your feature branch. All your changes will be isolated from the main branch until your PR is merged.
